body.p: Title of a high-ranking Assyrian and Babylonian court official, usually a eunuch and sometimes supervisor of the royal harem. A rabsaris was part of the Assyrian delegation (2 Kgs 18:17), a judge at the gate (Jer 39:3), the official who released Jeremiah from prison (v 13), and one of Nebuchadnezzar’s officials (Dn 1:3, 7).
